mainText:
There are no words to describe the wonders this man has put on earth.  
He pushed creativity to change the fundamental of how the human race 
utilizes modern technology, where form does not get in the way of 
function, but rather blends the two seamlessly.

He will be missed, but we must appreciate the time we had with him to 
experience what he leaves us.  The inspiration is that he accomplished 
so much in such a short period of time.  Simply wondrous in that passion 
does drive the human spirit to succeed.
header: Visionary & Creative Genius & Brilliant Business Man
author: Sidney
